article.title: Status and history for [ben]
article.para: See the Github repository for issues and changes in 2023 and after.

history.history-entry: Corrections thanks to Swarup, Atul Thakur and Steve White.
replaced the occurrences of U+09F7 ৷ BENGALI CURRENCY NUMERATOR FOUR by U+0964 । DEVANAGARI DANDA.
stage 4: full version provided by Kumari Co Ltd. via the Language Observatory.
stage 3: OHCHR identified as the source, partial XML contributed by Adobe Systems.
